description:
Out of the logical and illogical things one can do when a skating rink cancels your daughter's birthday party, starting a 500-person riot is not even close to one of those things. But one Florida woman thought differently, as she was upset enough to incite a riot that ended up in 26 people arrested after a skating rink canceled her daughter's birthday party.

Woman arrested for inciting a riot at Astro Skate in May www.youtube.com

title: Florida Woman Incites 500-Person Riot After Skating Rink Cancels Daughter's Birthday

description:
While Joe Biden was slurring and angry old man'ing his way through another NBC News video (while also misgendering his DEI hire Secret Service Director he doesn't remember talking to) Donald Trump made his first public appearance after last weekend's failed assassination attempt. Spoiler: It was to a tremendous ovation.

The only disappointing thing is he came out to "God Bless the USA" and not "Many Men (Wish Death)." There are rumors that the RNC is working with 50 Cent to make an appearance, so there is always Thursday.

title: Watch: Donald Trump's first public appearance since Saturday reveals... a changed man?

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Well, Trump has announced his Vice President candidate and it's J.D. Vance. And, as luck would have it, or as if I knew something like this would happen, I finished reading Hillbilly Elegy last night.

Hillbilly Elegy: A Memoir of Family and Culture in Crisis is a memoir of Vance's life while also serving up a slice of poor working class Americans (in this case, Appalachian hillbillies). Vance explores the American Dream when the hillbillies get ahold of it, weaving a story of the clash of economy and culture.

When we'r
title: Review: Hillbilly Elegy by J.D. Vance

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Former President Donald Trump selected Ohio Senator JD Vance as his running mate on Monday. Right away, the totally organic and not at all contrived "K-Hive" (get it, like Beyonce's BEY Hive but for Kamala Harris) took to X-Twitter proclaiming Harris was going to smoke JD Vance at the vice presidential debate. If JD's senate debates against career politician Rep. Tim Ryan are any indication of what's to come, nope.

The main knock on Vance is that he was a Never Trumper in 2016 and had said mean things about Trump in the past. The response to that is
title: These two clips illustrate JD Vance will be the one SMOKING Kamala Harris at the VP debate
